title: Cyber Zed skin
body:
**NOTE**: None of these belongs to me.

Here's the making of the skin: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ar_1CcAdRsU


 I wanted to share this because Zed basically only has 1 skin other that SKT T1 Zed but it's not always available.
And I also main Zed so I would love to get this skin.
**Cost:** *1350 RP*
**Sale:** *975*

{{champion:238}}   8)

**Particle changes:**

**Q;** *Razor Shuriken *
* Pure white trails follow and fade away when/ or after it's thrown
* Shuriken pops and fades into white and blue particles. "Kinda like when PulseFire Ezreal dies" but a bit less like it.

**W;** *Living Shadow*
* Sends out a white hologram shadow.

**E;** *Shadow Slash*
* White

**R;** *Death Mark*
* Same as W (Hologram shadow)


Here's the splash arts, side view, back view, and front.

replies.body: I agree this would be a great skin but i think if it was tweaked and add a bit of orange-red it could fit right into a project skin like{{champion:157}}
I agree it could look like shredder from the new ninja turtles movie. Taric needs a skin riot needs to stop making skins for champs that have like 12 skins ie Caitlyn vieger akali.
Is it actually coming out? Hopefully {{champion:238}} needs a skin.

> [{quoted}](name=Canes36,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=7FiPofVQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-21T17:04:39.578+0000)
>
> Is it actually coming out? Hopefully {{champion:238}} needs a skin.

Not sure, but yeah, I agree with Zed needing a skin, also for Zac and stuff.
It would awesome if Riot were to make this skin for Zed, and just fix it a little bit.
Were you paid for this? Scroll down to chat section your image is there https://www.curse.com/
